note: Today was a really productive day. I managed to finish all my assignments ahead of schedule, which felt like a huge weight off my shoulders. The weather was beautiful, so I went for a long walk in the park and listened to some music. It's amazing how much a bit of sunshine and fresh air can boost your mood.

Feeling a bit down today. I had a video call with my family, and it just made me miss them more. It's tough being so far away from home, especially when you see everyone together. I tried to distract myself with some reading, but my mind kept wandering back to them. Just one of those days, I guess.

Frustrated with a group project. It feels like I'm the only one putting in any effort, and the deadline is looming. I tried to initiate a discussion about dividing the work, but my teammates were unresponsive. It's so annoying when people don't pull their weight. I ended up doing most of it myself.

Had a bit of a scare today. I thought I lost my wallet on the bus, and my heart just sank. I spent an hour retracing my steps, panicking about having to cancel all my cards. Luckily, I found it in the bottom of my backpack. The relief was immense, but the adrenaline rush left me feeling shaky.

A surprisingly good day! I bumped into an old friend I haven't seen in ages, and we spent the afternoon catching up over coffee. It was so nice to reminisce about old times and see how much we've both grown. It's funny how an unexpected encounter can completely turn your day around for the better.

I think I ate something that didn't agree with me. My stomach has been churning all day, and I've just been feeling generally unwell and queasy. I had to cancel my plans with friends and just stay in bed. Hoping a good night's sleep will sort me out. Not a fun way to spend a Monday, that's for sure.

Watched a really sad movie tonight and it just opened the floodgates. I've been feeling a bit fragile lately, and the film's story just hit too close to home. It's strange how fiction can sometimes tap into your real-life emotions so powerfully. Had a good cry, which was probably needed anyway.

Finally submitted my big project today! The sense of relief and accomplishment is incredible. I celebrated by treating myself to a nice dinner and just relaxing without any guilt. It's been a stressful few weeks, but all the hard work paid off. Now I can finally breathe and enjoy some downtime.

The weather was gloomy and grey all day, and it definitely affected my mood. I felt lethargic and unmotivated, and couldn't bring myself to do anything productive. I just stayed indoors, listening to the rain. Sometimes the weather has such a strong influence on how you feel, and today was proof.

I got into a silly argument with a friend over something completely trivial. It's frustrating how a small misunderstanding can escalate so quickly. We both said things we didn't mean, and now there's this awkward tension. I hate conflict and I'm hoping we can talk it out and resolve it soon.
